power.title: Battle Awareness
power.fluff: You can sense danger before the threat is fully realized

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You roll initiative and dislike the result

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +10 bonus to the triggering initiative check.

power.title: Bewitching Glare
power.fluff: You catch your enemy's eye just as the foe makes an attack, and what it sees in your gaze rattles it enough to interfere with its strike

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must be eladrin.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy in the burst makes an attack roll against an ally you can see

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes a -2 penalty to the triggering attack roll.
If the triggering attack misses, you can pull the target 1 square, or 2 squares if it is marked by you.

power.title: Bodyguard's Readyness
power.fluff: You stand poised, ready to block attacks made against your allies with your shield, weapon, or failing all other options, with your body

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Bodyguard's Readyness stance.
Until the stance ends, you can use the following action at-will, and must use it it every time you are able to, or the stance immediately ends:

section.name: Free Interrupt:
section.text: Trigger: An ally adjacent to you takes damage; You reduce the damage by 5, then take damage equal to the reduction. You cannot reduce or avoid the damage you take.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Reduce by 10.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Reduce by 15.

power.title: Dauntless Endurance
power.fluff: You easily shake off a debilitating effect that would cripple another warrior

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Endurance.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You make a saving throw and dislike the result

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You reroll the triggering saving throw, but must use the second result.

power.title: Defensive Training
power.fluff: With a soldier's discipline, you steel yourself against attacks that would overcome a lesser person

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Defensive Training stance.
Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will

power.title: Get Up!
power.fluff: The aid you provide gets a dying ally back on his or her feet

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Heal.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One dying ally adjacent to you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value, and then stand up from prone.

power.title: Ignore Weakness
power.fluff: A surge of inner strength helps you shrug off the lingering effects of your enemy's attacks

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Endurance.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You start your turn immobilized, slowed, or weakened by an effect that a save can end

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make a saving throw against each triggering effect. You gain a +2 bonus to these saving throws if you are not bloodied.

power.title: Intimidating Reminder
power.fluff: Just the sight of your shield keeps the memory of its use fresh in the minds of your enemies

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Intimidate.

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be using a shield.
You can remain in the stance if you stop using a shield, but you cannot gain any benefit from it until you are again using a shield.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Intimidating Reminder stance.
Until the stance ends, enemies adjacent to you take a -2 penalty to Will.

When you hit an enemy with a Fighter attack that requires you to be using a shield, the enemy takes a penalty to attack rolls with the first attack it makes before the end of your next turn. The penalty equals one-half your Wisdom modifier (minimum penalty -1).

power.title: Knight's Challenge
power.fluff: You point your weapon at your enemy, its allies now looking at it expectantly as it wavers between accepting your challenge and losing face before its comrades

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Intimidate.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One enemy in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target's Will is equal to or lower than 12 + your level, you pull the target 2 squares, though you cannot pull the target into hindering or damaging terrain.
If the target's Will is higher, you regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

power.title: Steeling Roar
power.fluff: You let out an explosive roar, diverting your enemies' attentions to you while steeling you against the imminent assault

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst who can hear you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You mark each target until the end of your next turn.

In addition, you gain resist against all damage until the end of your next turn. The resist depends on the weapon you wield, or if you're using a shield. If multiple options apply, use the one that grants you the highest resist.

section.name: Axe, Hammer, Pick, Mace:
section.text: Equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Flail, Heavy Blade, Light Blade, Spear:
section.text: Equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Polearm, Staff:
section.text: Equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Shield:
section.text: Equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: The resist increases by +4.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: The resist increases by +8.
